slurm.rate¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Rate

Uses sleep to keep a desired message/sample rate.
class slurm.rate.Rate(hertz)[source]¶

Uses sleep to keep a desired message/sample rate.

sleep(self)[source]¶

This uses sleep to delay the function. If your loop is faster than your desired Hertz, then this will calculate the time difference so sleep keeps you close to you desired hertz. If your loop takes longer than your desired hertz, then it doesn’t sleep.
